arts.ttl: Marseille beats Brest 3-0 to move top of Ligue 1 and put pressure on injury-hit PSG
arts.sum: English players Angel Gomes and Mason Greenwood both scored as Marseille beat Brest 3-0 on Saturday to go top of Ligue 1 and put pressure on injury-hit Paris Saint-Germain. Greenwood sent Majecki the wrong way from the penalty spot in the 33rd after Brazilian Igor Paixão was fouled for Marseille, the only team to beat PSG in the league so far.

arts.ttl: PLAYER RATINGS | Marseille 3-0 Brest: Greenwood, Gomes, & Aubameyang fire Les Olympiens back to the top
arts.sum: THE MATCHGoals from Angel Gomes, Mason Greenwood, and Pierre-Emerick Aubameyang fired Olympique de Marseille top of the Ligue 1 table on Saturday afternoon with a 3-0 win over Stade Brestois…

arts.ttl: Brest predicted XI v Marseille: Kamory Doumbia out
arts.sum: Eric Roy has almost a fully fit squad to pick from as his struggling Stade Brestois side head to the Vélodrome to face Olympique de Marseille. Kamory Doumbia is the…

arts.ttl: Marseille predicted XI v Brest: a surprise return for Neal Maupay?
arts.sum: Whilst he still remains at the club, Neal Maupay looked to have already played his last game for Olympique de Marseille. The Frenchman has not been involved in first-team training,…
